gurmukhi: sPl jnMmu gur crn srin ilv sPl diRst gur drs AloeIAY
transliteration: Sadhal Jananmu Gur Charan Sarani Liva , Sadhal Drisat Gur Daras Aloeeai ?
translation: Human life is successful if spent in the refuge of the True Guru remembering the Supreme Being. Vision of the eyes is purposeful if it has the desire to see Him.

gurmukhi: sPl suriq gur sbd sunq inq ijhbw sPl gun iniD gun goeIAY
transliteration: Sadhal Surati Gur Sabad Sounat Nita , Jihabaa Sadhal Goun Nidhi Goun Goeeai ?
translation: Their hearing power is fruitful who hear that creative sound of the True Guru all the time. That tongue is blessed if it keeps on uttering the virtues of the Lord.

gurmukhi: sPl hsq gur crn pUjw pRnwm sPl crn prdCnw kY poeIAY
transliteration: Sadhal Hasat Gur Charan Poojaa Pranaama , Sadhal Charan Paradachhanaa Kai Poeeai ?
translation: Hands are blessed if they serve the True Guru and keep on praying to Him at His feet. Those feet are blessed that keep moving circumambulating the True Guru.

gurmukhi: sMgm sPl swDsMgiq shj Gr ihrdw sPl gurmiq kY smoeIAY ]499]
transliteration: Sangam Sadhal Saadhasangati Sahaj Ghara , Hiradaa Sadhal Gurmati Kai Samoeeai ?499?
translation: Union with saintly congregation is blessed if it brings in a state of equipoise. The mind is blessed only when it imbibes the teachings of the True Guru.  (499)
